query.message: searching key fields for all types

bag-type.query: SELECT DISTINCT a1_.id as a2_, a1_.primaryIdentifier as a3_, a1_.secondaryIdentifier as a4_, a1_.symbol as a5_, a1_.name as a6_ FROM BioEntity AS a1_ WHERE ((lower(a1_.primaryIdentifier) in ?) OR (lower(a1_.secondaryIdentifier) in ?) OR (lower(a1_.symbol) in ?) OR (lower(a1_.name) in ?))
SELECT DISTINCT a1_.id as a3_, a2_.identifier as a4_ FROM BioEntity AS a1_, CrossReference AS a2_ WHERE (a1_.crossReferences CONTAINS a2_ AND lower(a2_.identifier) in ?)
SELECT DISTINCT a1_.id as a3_, a2_.value as a4_ FROM BioEntity AS a1_, Synonym AS a2_ WHERE (a1_.synonyms CONTAINS a2_ AND lower(a2_.value) in ?)
